page.title: 10EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Results of a survey on where people work showed that the great majority worked within five miles of Pelsall. Walsall,Aldridge and Pelsall were the places where over half the people asked ,worked.Of the remainder eleven out of forty-eight are self employed. The other 37 worked in various local towns like Bloxwich,Darlaston and Wolverhampton to name just three.The longest travellers were one person going to Chesterfield,London,Leicester and two to Kidderminster.Therefore we can see that most people living in Pelsall work locally.
